txt.en: Hrímil's passage has frozen the fields
A piece of ancient, curved glass glints from the rubble
Gerja Defthand is in Bazanmanar, in north-east Clovengap.\n\nYou should let Gerja Defthand know what you found.
The new locations are in northern Clovengap.\n\nYou should search for the Amgaruslun Falls, the ruins of Anatrâd, the look-out, and Frósthel.
Hrímil's passage has silenced the fall's roar
'Ah, you return! What have you found, friend?'

'Since you are heading north, you may as well try to find these last few places. The Amgaruslun Falls and the ruins of Anatrâd. Even further north, now covered in rimefrost by the passage of Hrímil, was Frósthel. These were large fields by the side of the river, where livestock once grazed on lush grasses.\n\n'There is also mention of a look-out, near to the tunnel that leads to the Welkin-lofts. I cannot make out the name, but see if you can find any clues about where that may have been as well.'
Search for the fields of Frósthel
The passing of Hrímil has greatly altered the landscape of Clovengap. Are there still signs of the fields and fortresses beneath the ice?
Hrimil's passage has silenced the fall's roar
